text: How concerned are you about job loss due to AI?
How concerned are you about surveillance and control by AI?
How concerned are you about AI causing social isolation?
How concerned are you about safety and security risks from AI?
How concerned are you about AI impacting cultural values?
How dependent do you feel on AI tools in your daily life?
How optimistic are you about the overall future of AI?
How likely are you to use AI to manage your daily schedule?
How much do you agree that AI can understand and respect human values?
How interested are you in learning new AI technologies?
